segments.text: Dan , Dan , dude . You have to come over to my house right now !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , since when is your house a bank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean , what ’ s up with the locks and iron bars on your windows .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Security , Dan , security ! You can never be too safe you know ! A lot of sickos out there . Just the other day they caught that peeping tom red handed ! Had a high power telescope and binoculars by his window .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s the matter with you ? Why are you acting all paranoid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Paranoid ? I ’ m not paranoid ! I ’ m cautious ! You see Dan , we have to be on guard at all time ! People just invade your privacy as if they knew you ! Telemarketers , solicitors , even your bank ! They have way too much information ! I like to keep everything on a need to know basis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , well , what did you want to see me about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are being watched ! Be careful Dan ! Be careful !
segments.speaker: S2
